All Implemented Interfaces:
QueryEngine
Deprecated. Since 1.2 DataNode customization is done entirely via DbAdapter. 

public class OracleDataNode
extends DataNode

DataNode subclass customized for Oracle database engine.

Author:
Andrei Adamchik
